            boolean recycle)

      • effect

        public static byte[] effect(byte[] data)

      • saveBitmapToFile

        public static boolean saveBitmapToFile(byte[] data,
                       java.lang.String filePath,
                       Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                       int quality,
                       BitmapFactory.Options opts)
        参数:
        data - byte array of compressed image data
        filePath - file save as
        format - Bitmap.CompressFormat
        quality - Hint to the compressor, 0-100. 0 meaning compress for small size, 100 meaning compress for max quality. Some formats, like PNG which is lossless, will ignore the quality setting
        opts - BitmapFactory.Options
        返回:
        ret true if success

      • resizeBitmap

        public static Bitmap resizeBitmap(Bitmap bitamp,
                  int resizeWidth,
                  int resizeHeight,
                  boolean recycle)
        参数:
        bitamp - orignal bitmap
        resizeWidth - new width
        resizeHeight - new height
        recycle - If true the orignal bitmap will be recycled and do not do further operation with orignal bitmap in this case.If you need to reuse orignal bitmap plz set false here and do not forget recycle by yourself.
        返回:
        newBitmap resized bitmap

      • saveBitmapToFile

        public static boolean saveBitmapToFile(Bitmap bitmap,
                       java.lang.String filePath,
                       Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                       int quality,
                       boolean recycle)
        参数:
        bitmap - orignal bitmap
        filePath - file path to save as
        format - Bitmap.CompressFormat
        quality - Hint to the compressor, 0-100. 0 meaning compress for small size, 100 meaning compress for max quality. Some formats, like PNG which is lossless, will ignore the quality setting
        recycle - If true the orignal bitmap will be recycled and do not do further operation with orignal bitmap in this case.If you need to reuse orignal bitmap plz set false here and do not forget recycle by yourself.
        返回:
        ret true if success
